channel.title: GitHub Hackathon on Raphael Borges
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub Hackathon on Raphael Borges

item.title: A custom action to deploy mdBook #githubhack2023
item.description: I developed this GitHub Action to automate the deployment of ebooks using customized configurations that better suit the needs of the projects I am involved in. The motivation behind creating this action was to streamline the process and eliminate manual steps required for ebook deployment. It participated in the GitHub + DEV 2023 Hackathon. You can read the full blog post - in english on dev.to.
